title: News Out of Georgia (Ep 1426)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the breaking news out of Georgia about the 2020 election and a troubling story out of Illinois about a school official. 

News Picks: 


Georgia court sets a hearing date for a serious election challenge.

Apparently, cancel culture only applies if you’re a conservative.


Small businesses are getting crushed while business giants prosper. 


Chicago school board member gets busted on vacation while pushing for schools to remain closed.

In this episode, I discuss the breaking news out of Georgia about the 2020 election and a troubling story out of Illinois about a school official. 


News Picks: 

  • Georgia court sets a hearing date for a serious election challenge.
  • Apparently, cancel culture only applies if you’re a conservative.
  • Small businesses are getting crushed while business giants prosper. 
  • Chicago school board member gets busted on vacation while pushing for schools to remain closed.
